name: Wizard Runner (Domanek)
description:
This game was initally made for the Secret Santa Jam 2021 in  roughly a week.

Controls:  WASD - Move,   E -  Interact,     SHIFT - Sprint,    SPACE - Jump,    C - Crouch,    Mouse1 - Cast Spell

Due to limited time I could not polish the game as I would like to. This was also another go for me in using Unity Probuilder to build my level, going to stick to Blender in the future.

Credits goes to Plai and DanisTutorials on Youtube for making good tutorials on movement.
